alert.note: Alert for Logan (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 24 at 8:46AM MDT until June 28 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Denver has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Colorado... South Platte River at Atwood affecting Logan County. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO EARLY WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...South Platte River at Atwood. * WHEN...From this morning to early Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 9.5 feet, The river is out of its banks and into fields and meadows. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 AM MDT Saturday the stage was 9.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 10.5 feet early Monday morning. - Action stage is 9.5 feet. - Flood stage is 11.5 feet. &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
